basics.name: Milan Bukovics
basics.label: Student-Athlete
basics.summary: I am master student-athlete pursuing MS in Electrical Engineering in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Performs a variety of tasks to support efficient operations, including food preparation, customer service, and maintaining cleanliness in compliance with Sodexo standards.
highlights: Delivered high-quality service as a waiter and bartender at upscale events.
Managed catering logistics for large corporate and private events, including tip-off events.
Adapted to various roles, from bartending to event setup, in fast-paced environments.
Ensured client satisfaction and maintained service excellence over four years.

volunteer.organization: University of Hawaii Swim and Dive Team
highlights: Team Captain, 2024 Season – Led by example in fostering discipline, teamwork, and accountability.
Division I Conference Champion – Competed at the highest collegiate level, achieving significant victories.
Demonstrated leadership through effective communication and collaboration, enhancing team cohesion.
Developed resilience, time management, and adaptability, balancing athletics with academics.
Participated at international competitions: 2x European Junior Championships (2018-2019) and World Junior Championship (2019).

awards.title: Dean's List Award
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to those students who maintain at least a 3.5 GPA in the given semester.
